thread.title: Haunted house camera captures terror, hilarity

title: Haunted house camera captures terror, hilarity
text: Close Image 1 of 21 Every year, the Nightmares Fear Factory haunted house in Niagara Falls, Canada releases a selection of photos of its terrified visitors. These are their faces of fear. Every year, the Nightmares Fear Factory haunted house in Niagara Falls, Canada releases a selection of photos of its terrified visitors. These are their faces of fear. Photo: Nightmares Fear Factory/Courtesy Every year, the Nightmares Fear Factory haunted house in Niagara... Photo-8795477.118756 - SFGate Image 2 of 21 The Nightmares Fear Factory, of course, does not reveal what has made its visitors so scared. You'll have to insert your worst nightmare in each photo. The Nightmares Fear Factory, of course, does not reveal what has made its visitors so scared. You'll have to insert your worst nightmare in each photo. Photo: Nightmares Fear Factory/Courtesy The Nightmares Fear Factory, of course, does not reveal what has... Photo-8795469.118756 - SFGate Image 3 of 21 The attraction even has a "chicken list" for people who screamed to be let out and didn't make it through the entire maze. The list is 130,000 people long.
